thread.title: Supreme Court Nominee Neil Gorsuch Scales Back Description of Pro Bono Work at Harvard - WSJ
thread.title_full: Supreme Court Nominee Neil Gorsuch Scales Back Description of Pro Bono Work at Harvard - WSJ

author: Beth Reinhard
title: Supreme Court Nominee Neil Gorsuch Scales Back Description of Pro Bono Work at Harvard - WSJ
text:
Supreme Court nominee Neil Gorsuch scaled back a description of his pro bono work at Harvard Law School in a questionnaire released Saturday by the Senate Judiciary Committee. 
President Donald Trump had highlighted that work when he introduced Judge Gorsuch nearly two weeks ago, saying he had “demonstrated a commitment to serving the less fortunate.”

In the newly released questionnaire, Judge Gorsuch said he “participated” in... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
